meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of medicine dealing with the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunologically advanced treatments helped boost the patient's immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study immunologically related diseases to understand the immune system better.
meanings.sent3: The immunologically gifted doctor could spot immune system issues from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the immune system was immunologically unmatched in the medical field.
meanings.sent5: The immunologically focused research shed light on new ways to boost immunity.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the body's ability to resist infection and disease.
meanings.sent1: The vaccine worked immunologically to strengthen the body's defenses.
meanings.sent2: She fought off the flu immunologically by maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's powers worked immunologically to protect the city from harm.
meanings.sent4: His positive mindset acted immunologically to ward off negativity and illness.
meanings.sent5: The medicine acted immunologically, like a shield against harmful viruses.
